SEARCH
Package SC2002.Project.entity

Class User

java.lang.Object
SC2002.Project.entity.User
Direct Known Subclasses:
Applicant, HDB_Manager
public abstract class User extends Object
Represents a system user with basic identity and authentication capabilities.

This abstract class serves as the base for all user types in the BTO Management System, providing common attributes and behaviors shared across different user roles. It includes personal information, authentication mechanisms, and basic user operations.

User is extended by concrete classes such as Applicant, HDB_Officer, and HDB_Manager, each adding role-specific functionality.

Since:
2025-04-24

    • User

      public User(String nric, String firstName, String lastName, MaritalStatus maritalStatus, int age)
      Constructs a new User with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      nric - The National Registration Identity Card number, unique identifier for the user
      firstName - The user's first name
      lastName - The user's last name
      maritalStatus - The marital status of the user (SINGLE or MARRIED)
      age - The age of the user in years
